questions.question: Do you have any difficulty hearing quiet sounds?
Have you experienced any sudden changes in your hearing?
Do you often ask people to repeat themselves during conversations?
Have you noticed any ringing or buzzing in your ears?
Do you have trouble hearing in noisy environments?
Have you ever had a hearing test, and if so, what were the results?
Do you use any hearing aids or assistive devices?
Have you ever had any ear infections or ear-related issues?
Have you been exposed to loud noises or music for extended periods?
Do you experience dizziness or balance issues related to your hearing?
